news.title: Weak password allowed hackers to sink a 158-year-old company
news.summary: Transport company KNP forced to shut down after international hacker gangs target thousands of UK businesses.

news.title: At least 19 dead after air force jet crashes into Bangladesh school
news.summary: The air force training aircraft crashed into a school campus in the capital Dhaka.

news.title: Pensioners in 2050 to be worse off than those retiring today, government warns
news.summary: Future pensioners are set to be worse off than today's with four-in-10 not saving enough for retirement, says the DWP.

news.title: Police say asylum protest turned into 'thuggery'
news.summary: Six people are arrested during a protest outside a hotel used to house asylum seekers in Essex.

news.title: Residents told to leave unsafe flats despite Â£1m improvements
news.summary: The cash from tenants and taxpayers has been spent trying to fix Beech Rise and Willow Rise.

news.title: Ryanair considers increasing bonus for staff who spot oversized bags
news.summary: The airline says it is "determined to eliminate the scourge of oversized bags" on its planes.

news.title: Reburial service held for World War One soldiers
news.summary: Men from Essex and Bedfordshire regiments are laid to rest after their remains are found in France.

news.title: Five key takeaways from the landmark water sector review
news.summary: The wide-ranging review was launched amid growing public concern about sewage spills and rising bills.

news.title: The rise of the far-right 'Japanese First' party
news.summary: Sanseito has won over Japanese voters with its warnings against a "silent invasion" of foreigners.

news.title: UK fighter jet stuck in India for five weeks is finally ready to fly
news.summary: The F-35B landed in Kerala on 14 June after running into bad weather, then  reported a technical snag.
